Title: Directs the New York state department of transportation and the New York city department of transportation to conduct a study on parking availability
Summary: Directs the New York state department of transportation and the New York city department of transportation to conduct a study on parking availability along the portion of 8th Avenue between 39th street and 73rd street in the borough of Brooklyn in the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the New York state department of transportation and the New York city department of transportation to conduct a study on parking availability; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
